user_instruction: 'Send Mark an update on the current candidates for the engineering team position. You can check out my Notion for information. Mark'"'"'s email is mark.johnson@techcorp.com.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["mark.johnson@techcorp.com"],"subject":"Update on Engineering Team Candidates","body":"Hi Mark,

I wanted to give you a quick update on the candidates we have in the pipeline for the open engineering role:

1. Tom Davis – Seasoned full-stack engineer with over a decade of experience leading development teams at large software companies.
2. Susan Lee – Holds an advanced degree in computer science and brings strong expertise in AI / machine-learning, with several years at a fast-growing tech firm.
3. Raj Patel – Senior engineer focused on cybersecurity with around ten years of industry experience across multiple security-centric organizations.

All three have completed initial interviews and look promising for the role. Let me know if you’d like any additional details or to schedule follow-up conversations.

Best,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: The update has been sent to Mark. Let me know if there’s anything else you’d like to add or adjust!
